ESM_DriverMCB_t Struct Reference
ESM Driver Internal Data Structures

ESM Driver Master Control Block. More...

#include <drivers/esm/include/esm_internal.h>

Data Fields

volatile ESMRegs * ptrESMBase
 Base address of the ESM address space to be used.
 
HwiP_Handle hwiHandleHi
 Registered high priority Interrupt Handler.
 
HwiP_Handle hwiHandleLo
 Registered low priority Interrupt Handler.
 
ESM_NotifyParams notifyParams [ESM_MAX_NOTIFIERS]
 Registered notify function. Currently only upto 4 notify functions are supported.
 
uint32_t esmInitStatus [5]
 Used to take snapshot of the ESM status registers before clearing them.
 
uint32_t debugEsmISRCount [4]
 DEBUG: to keep track of various ESM interrupts received by the system.
 

Detailed Description

ESM Driver Master Control Block.

The structure is used to hold all the pertinent information with respect to the ESM Driver.
